Title: How to determine voter qualification
Designer: Office of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
Publisher: Zhongguo minzhu fazhi chubanshe (中国民主法制出版社)
Notes: Part of the series Elections of delegates from urban and rural districts for the new session of the National People's Congress (2011).Everybody over 18 years of age, regardless of nationality, gender, occupation, religion, etc., has the right to vote and to be elected.The voters' registers must be made public 20 days before the election. In case of discrepancies, these must be brought forward to the Election Committee.
Theme: Political ReformLegal KnowledgeElections of delegates from urban and rural districts for the new session of the National People's Congress (2011)National Minorities
